Text:
For a great video of Robin

Robin Trower - Rock Goes To College BBC-TV 1980

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3671401

Thanks. Love Robin. I recall (vaguely) watching Trower play live at Winterland on New Years Eve 1975 (?1976) in San Fran on the local cable channel. It was B&W but, I still recall loving it. That can be found on YouTube so, check that out (pretty bad quality).
Cheers!

Anybody know where I can find Truce?  I have BLT and Seven Moons but need Truce for the set. 
Thanks in advance for any help
